name: Rochester Museum and Science Center
description: Explore hands-on exhibits and interactive science displays.

name: Highland Park
description: Famous for its annual Lilac Festival and beautiful landscapes.

name: George Eastman Museum
description: One of the oldest photography museums in the world.

name: Seabreeze Amusement Park
description: A fun amusement park with rides and water attractions.

name: Strong National Museum of Play
description: Interactive exhibits dedicated to play and gaming history.

name: Seneca Park Zoo
description: Family-friendly zoo with a variety of animals and exhibits.

name: Rochester Public Market
description: Historic marketplace with local vendors and fresh produce.

name: Charlotte-Genesee Lighthouse
description: The oldest active lighthouse on Lake Ontario.

name: ARTISANworks
description: A unique art space filled with works from local artists.

name: Maplewood Park and Rose Garden
description: Scenic park with a beautiful rose garden and waterfalls.
